textField.title:
How many times did you
laugh last week ?

game.resp:
So much that your
sides still ache!

textField.title:
Build your physical
strength
textField.subTitle:
It's physical fitness time !
Here's to a week of endurance training, high performance
and pure pleasure… Are you ready ?

game.text:
Make the most of your Facebook
breaks to work your abs

Start the exercise right away:

With your chest at a slight incline, hold your
legs straight out in the air, feet crossed, for
30 seconds. Repeat this exercise 3 times.

Continue regularly all week long to strengthen and
improve your happy outlook.

textField.title:
Did you know that your muscles are
approximately 75% water?
textField.text:
Proper hydration helps renew the water in your muscles
required for muscle function.

game.text:
Start the exercise right away:

Keeping your back straight, let yourself slide down
against a wall until you reach the "seated" position,
as if on a chair. Hold this position for 30 seconds.
Slide back up, shake your legs out and then
start all over again.

And continue regularly all week long to strengthen and
improve your happy outlook.

bubble.text:
Your body is mostly water.
And about every 7 weeks,
that water is, mostly
by what you drink.

Choose to be reborn
by giving your body
pure, refreshing evian
natural spring water
its unique, well balanced
wmineral composition.

textField.title: Congratulations,
textField.subTitle:
you've done a great job. But don't stop now...
Continue your efforts to boost your Youth Quotient while you
wait for the next series of exercises. Have a great week!

textField.sub: Check your evolution along your Live Young Training.
